TopicTitle: Any mod to reduce Mission Control Range?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I am using stock CommNet (i.e. not RemoteTech), and I want connections to go through my carefully placed satellites rather than the KSC. Even after setting the range to 0.02 in difficulty options, the damn thing will give a 100% connection to a meagerly communotron all the way beyond the mun. Any way to nerf that? I looked all over the internet, but can't seem to find anything.
You can do this with a custom config using Custom Barn Kit
